section.name: name
section.description: hub - an HCLI service discovery hub

section.name: description
section.description: The hub CLI allows you to manage HCLI service discovery.

command.name: ns
command.description: The "ns" command helps manage HCLI service namespaces.

command.name: service
command.description: The "service" command helps find a service, by name, across all namespaces.

section.name: name
section.description: hub ns - manage HCLI service namespaces.

section.name: description
section.description: The "ns" command allows you to manage HCLI service namespaces to help with HCLI service disovery and service name collision avoidance.

section.name: name
section.description: hub service - locate an HCLI service across all namespaces.

section.name: description
section.description: The "service" command allows you to locate all the available hub registered instances of an HCLI service, across all namespaces.

section.name: name
section.description: hub ns ls - list all hub namespaces.

section.name: description
section.description: The "ls" lists all the available hub registered namespaces.
